segments.text: I'm really worried about the immediate dangers present in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most obvious one is the boy on that two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are definitely splayed, and it looks like it could tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, reaching for those cookies in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height, especially onto a hard kitchen floor, could be serious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there's the growing puddle of water from the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has one foot in it, utterly unaware of the slippery hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she or one of the children were to slip, someone could get seriously hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such obvious dangers being completely ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already damaging the cabinets and the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to these alarming details?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost anticipate the crash and the splash that's about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
